snippet: Tim Thomas, who declined to participate in the Stanley Cup champion Bruins’ recent visit to the White House, made 35 saves to help defeat Washington, 4-1.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Boston Bruins defeat Washington Capitals, 4-1; other NHL results noted.
lead_paragraph: Tim Thomas, who declined to participate in the Stanley Cup champion Bruins’ recent visit to the White House, made 35 saves to help defeat Washington, 4-1.

headline.seo: Tim Thomas and Bruins Shut Down Capitals, 4-1
headline.main: In His Return to Capital, Thomas Leads Bruins
headline.print_headline: In His Return to Capital, Thomas Leads Bruins
